name: Black, no sugar
description:
As a true coffee enthusiast, you cannot allow those sugar cubes to fall into the cups and spoil the pure taste of some good, black coffee.

The task, however righteous it may be, can prove exhausting, so keep your caffeine level and your speed up by hitting the coffee machine as often as needed.

More sugar starts falling as your score increases. You only have 3 attempts, but one of them will be restored every 300 points.

You can still catch sugar cubes very low in their trajectory. Do not give up even if you feel you can't make it in time.

Disclaimer : This game does not condone playing with sugar cubes around coffee cups. Do not do this in real life, it could have dire consequences.

Controls :

Press the left and right arrows to move around, Spacebar to start or pause the game.

The device's buttons are also clickable and fully functional.

The 'Sound' button can save your ears by removing those annoying beeping noises. Use the 'Add Sugar' button if you're bored with the early stages of the game, or in order to practice for a harder difficulty level.

Made over a few coffee breaks for the Coffee Game Jam.
Theme ? Coffee.
